inclusion.criterion: Graves' disease confirmed by laboratory testing
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: able to understand English and follow instructions
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: intermediate and high risk differentiated thyroid cancer requiring radioiodine remnant ablation or moderately high dose I-131 for treatment of residual cervical disease
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: able to understand simple English and follow instructions
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: diseases involving cervical spine, such as spondylosis and severe degenerative joint disease
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: persons unable to understand simple instructions
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has metastatic papillary thyroid cancer, which may be a contraindication for the trial. Additionally, patient's age and ability to follow instructions are not clear indicators of eligibility.
